= POSIX Worker Configuration

This config section convert environment variable related to posix worker configuration to valid odoo CLI.

include::partial$converters/workers.adoc[]


[[option_workers]]
== workers
Convert environ key=WORKER_HTTP cli args=['--workers'] to workers

TIP: Supported Odoo version from 12.0 until 19.0

The environment variable `WORKER_HTTP` is used and expect a xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_int[int].

Odoo cli used:

* --workers

[[option_max_cron_threads]]
== max_cron_threads
Maximum number of threads processing concurrently cron jobs (default 2).

TIP: Supported Odoo version from 12.0 until 19.0

The environment variable `WORKER_CRON` is used and expect a xref:ROOT:type_var.adoc#env_var_value_type_int[int].

Odoo cli used:

* --max-cron-threads
